Game’s background

This is a story about a kid taking shower. He is naughty and imaginative. When he gets older, his mother let him shower by himself. He goes into the bathroom and starts dreaming of fighting germs and monsters. Today, he went to play football, he was covered in mud…

How To Play

A/D – Move

Space – Jump (Can double jump)

W - Climb (Feet need to touch the ladder before climbing)

Mouse Scroll – Change weapon state

1/2 – use toys (buff items)

Rule

Choose two toys to support you, pick up them in the game scene and use it as you need.

Enemies come up every 90 – 200 seconds, Boss comes up after 5 minutes.

Kill the enemies and gain hygiene value

The player wins when the Hygiene value is over 70% after 10 minutes.

Platform

Rack – Normal

Other platforms – Slippery

Curtain – Ladder

Sponge – Jump Pad

Body Wash – Bubble bullet reload +30s  (Water state does not need to reload)

Shower Head – Exit (Player can leave before the time is up)

Weapon

4 states – Small bubble, Medium bubble, Large Bubble and water

Only bubbles can kill enemies

Only water can break enemies’ shields.

Toys

Microphone - Double damage

Duck - Enlarge and wipe out enemies vertically

Bubble Turret - Release bubble every 2 seconds

Football - Can kick or use water to play with, it damages enemies when hit

Sticky Sock - Attract enemies 

Enemy in this Level

Floating germ

Split germ (Binary Fission)

Bouncy germ (original concept from flea)

Chlorobium (rolling enemy)

Small Mud

Medium Mud

Boss Mud
